nodes.text: Red Robed Wookiee was a painting made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It was part of a series of five paintings, alongside Kashyyyk at Night, Proud Wookiee, Gift Giving Wookiees, and Wookiee with Pups, that were made for the festivities of Life Day. The painting in question depicted a Wookiee wearing a Life Day robe. It was supplied during the events of an annual Life Day celebration on Kashyyyk.
Red Robed Wookiee, alongside Kashyyyk at Night, Proud Wookiee, Gift Giving Wookiees and Wookiee with Pups, were supplied during the 2006 Wookiee Life Day festivities.
